(1,): As a developer, I want to process deletions by date, so that I can manage historical data efficiently As a developer, I want to generate D1 files based on FPDS data, so that I can produce necessary documentation for submissions As a validator, I want to prevent double publishing of submissions, so that data integrity is maintained As a data analyst, I want to extract historical FPDS data, so that I can analyze trends over time
(2,): As a user, I want to redesign the resources page with a new style, so that it meets current design standards and user preferences As a QA tester, I want to report user testing findings to agencies, so that they are informed of usability issues and improvements As a developer, I want to log my activities, so that I have a record of changes and updates made in the system As a testing coordinator, I want to specify a user testing schedule, so that we can plan and execute user testing sessions effectively
(0,): As a validator, I want to validate FABS submissions for required fields, so that erroneous submissions can be identified and corrected As a user, I want to access published FABS submissions, so that I can review and utilize the finalized data As a user, I want to derive office names from office codes, so that I can easily reference offices in reports As a system administrator, I want to provide FABS groups based on FREC paradigm, so that users can understand groupings and classifications As a user, I want to download uploaded files related to submissions, so that I can access the original documents for review As a user, I want to provide detailed information about specific submissions, so that stakeholders can understand the context and details of each submission
(3,): As a daily task manager, I want to load FPDS data, so that the system is updated with the latest information for processing As a developer, I want to generate File F in the correct format for submissions, so that compliance with submission requirements is ensured
